soil_fertilizer.soil_condition: dry soil in vegetable beds, especially near okra and bitter gourd, likely due to recent heatwave
fertilizers_applied: light dose of neem oil spray to brinjal plants

observed: aphids on underside of banana leaves
treatment_applied: neem oil spray on brinjal plants
pest_disease.damage_notes: Yellow patches on brinjal leaves potentially due to nitrogen deficiency or early fungal infection

tasks_completed: cleared debris from water channels in paddy fields for 30 minutes
fixed a loose plank in the cow shed
harvested about 3 kg of long beans

machinery.maintenance_notes: Minor repairs done in the cow shed, including fixing a loose plank and cleaning the feeding trough

crops: vegetables including okra, bitter gourd, brinjal, banana, long beans, rubber trees
additional_notes: Latex yield from rubber trees was slightly lower than usual, possibly due to dry soil. Plans to monitor soil moisture levels and adjust irrigation or add compost.
